desc: Lindas of Kinsale is a family run jewellery shop, est 1974, specialising in diamond rings & rare coloured stones. Unusual collections of Vintage and Contemporary jewellery. Old gold. Insurance valuations & diamond certificates are provided with full after sales service.

layout.text: Carefully curated collections of the best vintage & contemporary diamond jewellery.  We specialise in graded certified diamonds, rare coloured stones, old gold and signed designer pieces.  If you can't find it, we can make it. Our diamond setters are Boodles and Graff trained. The best in the business!
